{{Infobox Berry |name = #20 Prine |image = [[File:Lum.png]] |caption = Cette Baie pousse lentement pour stocker les nutriments nécessaires à la santé des Pokémon. Cette Baie multiplie les effets des plants de Baie autour d'elle. |growtime = 1h 0m 0s |harvest = 1 baie |replant = 0% |mutation = 0.1% |points = 1,000 ||flavor =
*10 épicé *10 sèche *10 sucrée *10 amère *0 acide |helditem = [[File:Shaymin.png|30px]]Shaymin, [[File:Mew.png|30px]]Mew, [[File:Celebi.png|30px]]Celebi }} '''Prine''' est un type de [[Berries/fr|Baie]] qui peut être plantée dans la [[Farm/fr|Ferme]]. Elle s'obtient en entourant une parcelle avec les 8 [[Berries#Baies de Gen 1|Baies de première génération]] à maturité. == Tables de croissance == === Stades de croissance === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" |- ! !! Modificateur !! Temps Maturité-Flétrissement !! Fertibérance nécessaire pour mûrir |- ! Aucun | 1 hour -
12 hours || --- |- ! Engrais ou Kwakarrosoir | 40 mins -
8 hours || 8 engrais |- ! Engrais et Kwakarrosoir | 26 mins 40 secs -
5 hours 20 mins || 6 engrais |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Lum_Flow_Chart1.png|500px]]
== Stratégie de mutation == === Formations de plantation possibles === Vous pouvez remplir votre ferme de la manière suivante pour obtenir des baies Prine. [[Aspear/fr|Willia]] || [[File:Oran.png|30px]]
[[Oran/fr|Oran]] || [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus/fr|Sitrus]] |} === Notes importantes === Le temps total nécessaire pour obtenir un champs plein de Baies de première génération mûres est court à seulement dix minutes (sans modificatuers), mais la baie Prine peut s'avérer difficile à obtenir. Cela est principalement dû aux forts taux de mutation des baies indésirables qui pourraient muter sur la case centrale, combiné au temps court entre maturité et flétrissement des baies de première genération. Il est fréquent de passer par de nombreux cycles de ce processus de pousse avant d'obtenir ne serait-ce qu'une seule mutation de baie Prine. Le temps de croissance étant si court, si vous utilisez le Kwakarroisr, remplacez-le par un autre [[Oak Items/fr|objet de Chen]] dès que la baie Ceriz est mûre. De plus, bien qu'obtenir deux cycles de maturité de la baie Ceriz est possible pendant un cycle de Sitrus, il est souvent difficile de coordoner ce timing avec les autres baies. Lorsque les 8 baies sont mûres, assurez-vous d'appliquer du [[Farm Items/fr|Fertistantané]] sur la parcelle centrale, et utilisez aussitôt une [[Farm Items/fr|Pel' à Baie]] sur toute baie indésirable qui apparaît. Un suivi attentif de votre parcelle durant ce processus peut considérablement réduire le nombre de tentative de Prine avec d'obtenir une mutation. === Tableau de chronométrage === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |+ ''Tous les temps indiqués sont basés sur le temps restant avant que la première baie plantée n'arrive à maturité'' ! Baie !! Temps de plantation
sans modificateur!! Temps de plantation avec
Engrais ou Kwakarrosoir || Temps de plantation avec
Engrais et Kwakarrosoir | [[Sitrus/fr|Sitrus]] || - || - || - |- | [[Oran/fr|Oran]] || 5 mins avant maturité || 3 mins 20 secs avant maturité || rowspan=8|Non optimal |- | [[Leppa/fr|Mepo]] || 4 mins avant maturité || 2 mins 40 secs avant maturité |- | [[Aspear/fr|Willia]] || 2 mins avant maturité || 1 min 20 secs avant maturité |- | [[Rawst/fr|Fraive]] || 1 min 20 secs avant maturité || 53 secs avant maturité |- | [[Pecha/fr|Pêcha]] || 1 min avant maturité || 40 secs avant maturité |- | [[Chesto/fr|Maron]] || 40 secs avant maturité || 26 secs avant maturité |- | [[Cheri/fr|Ceriz]] || 30 secs avant maturité || 20 secs avant maturité |- |}

==Utiliser la Prine== Des agencements de Ferme utilisant la Prine peuvent être consulté sur ces pages: * [[Pokémon_Day_Care/fr|Maximiser le gain de pas pour une reproduction plus rapide des Pokémon]] * [[Shiny Chance/fr|Maximiser les chances de Pokémon chromatiques pour rendre chromatique tous les Pokémon]] * [[Farming Setups/fr|Divers agencements de Ferme utiles]]

Cela est principalement dû aux forts taux de mutation des baies indésirables qui pourraient muter sur la case centrale, combiné au temps court entre maturité et flétrissement des baies de première genération. Il est fréquent de passer par de nombreux cycle..."

[[Sitrus/fr|Sitrus]] |} === Notes importantes ===
The total growth time to achieve a field full of ripe Gen 1 berries is short at only ten minutes (without modifiers), but the Lum berry can be challenging to obtain. This is primarily due to the high mutation rates of unwanted berries that can mutate on the center space, as well as the short ripe-death time of Gen 1 berries. It is common to go through many full cycles of this growing process before a single Lum berry has been successfully mutated. As the growth time is so short, if you use the Sprayduck be sure to switch it to a different [[Oak Item]] as soon as the Cheri berry is ripe. Furthermore, while getting two cycles of Cheri berry ripeness is possible in one Sitrus cycle, it is often difficult to coordinate this timing with the other berries. When all 8 berries are ripe, be sure to apply a [[Farm Items|Surprise Mulch]] to the center plot and [[Farm Items|Shovel]] any unwanted berries as they appear. Diligently watching your plots during this process may dramatically reduce the number of Lum attempts necessary to achieve the mutation.

This is primarily due to the high mutation rates of unwanted berries that can mutate on the center space, as well as the short ripe-death time of Gen 1 berries. It is common to go through many full cycles of this growing process before a single Lum berry has been successfully mutated. As the growth time is so short, if you use the Sprayduck be sure to switch it to a different [[Oak Item]] as soon as the Cheri berry is ripe. Furthermore, while getting two cycles of Cheri berry ripeness is possible in one Sitrus cycle, it is often difficult to coordinate this timing with the other berries. When all 8 berries are ripe, be sure to apply a [[Farm Items|Surprise Mulch]] to the center plot and [[Farm Items|Shovel]] any unwanted berries as they appear. Diligently watching your plots during this process may dramatically reduce the number of Lum attempts necessary to achieve the mutation.

=== Important notes ===
The total growth time to achieve a field full of ripe Gen 1 berries is short at only ten minutes (without modifiers), but the Lum berry can be challenging to obtain. This is primarily due to the high mutation rates of unwanted berries that can mutate on the center space, as well as the short ripe-death time of Gen 1 berries. It is common to go through many full cycles of this growing process before a single Lum berry has been successfully mutated. As the growth time is so short, if you use the Sprayduck be sure to switch it to a different [[Oak Item]] as soon as the Cheri berry is ripe. Furthermore, while getting two cycles of Cheri berry ripeness is possible in one Sitrus cycle, it is often difficult to coordinate this timing with the other berries. When all 8 berries are ripe, be sure to apply a [[Farm Items|Surprise Mulch]] to the center plot and [[Farm Items|Shovel]] any unwanted berries as they appear. Diligently watching your plots during this process may dramatically reduce the number of Lum attempts necessary to achieve the mutation.

=== Important notes ===
The total growth time to achieve a field full of ripe Gen 1 berries is short at only ten minutes (without modifiers), but the Lum berry can be challenging to obtain. This is primarily due to the high mutation rates of unwanted berries that can mutate on the center space, as well as the short ripe-death time of Gen 1 berries. It is common to go through many full cycles of this growing process before a single Lum berry has been successfully mutated. As the growth time is so short, if you use the Sprayduck be sure to switch it to a different [[Oak Item]] as soon as the Cheri berry is ripe. Furthermore, while getting two cycles of Cheri berry ripeness is possible in one Sitrus cycle, it is often difficult to coordinate this timing with the other berries. When all 8 berries are ripe, be sure to apply a [[Farm Items|Surprise Mulch]] to the center plot and [[Farm Items|Shovel]] any unwanted berries as they appear. Diligently watching your plots during this process may dramatically reduce the number of Lum attempts necessary to achieve the mutation.
